Description: Lower body sherd of Chian pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky dark brown (mostly worn); exterior: single dark brown line; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: Very little information can be drawn based on the interior and exterior decoration. Chalices and kantharoi dated to the second quarter of the seventh century tend to be thinner in section.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0363) (phase 2)
